title: Faces in a crowd
creator_credit: Roger Dunton, David Powell and Abacus Documentaries
brief_description: Looks at the city of London and shows how the Port and the city are complementary, mutually supporting a vast trading complex. This relationship is largely revealed in this film in terms of people - working people - in the markets, for which the city is justly famous.
creator_credit_for_label: Roger Dunton, David Powell and Abacus Documentaries
